Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York City Health and Hospitals facilities to report adverse maternal health events to NYPORTS based on an expanded and standardized definition of adverse maternal health events, including adverse events at least 30 days post-partum
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYC Health and Hospitals facilities to report adverse maternal health events to NYPORTS based on an expanded and standardized definition of adverse maternal health events, including adverse events at least 30 days post-partum.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Department of Health to confidentially share data regarding adverse maternal health events from the New York Patient Occurrence Reporting and Tracking System with the New York City Maternal Mortality Review Committee
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYS Dept of Health to confidentially share data regarding adverse maternal health events from the NY Patient Occurrence Reporting and Tracking System with the NYC Maternal Mortality Review Committee.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Department of Health to conduct regular reviews of NYPORTS data, and to require hospitals to retroactively fill in missing data
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Calling on the New York State Department of Health to conduct regular reviews of NYPORTS data, and to require hospitals to retroactively fill in missing data.
